name: Water Leakage Everywhere!
description:
Core Mechanics & Dynamics

  • Challenge is created with the distinction between the pathways and the grassy areas. One has to find a way to either move the player into a grassy area or clone the player onto a grassy area.
  • Cloning the player will create a new clone player offset from the original player on the x axis. The clone, when initially produced, can be at any level of height on the Y axis, and therefore can be used on isolated goal points on roofs of buildings.
  • Trees, Park Benches, Houses, and Other Buildings can be used to press against and make a pattern to match up with the goals.
  • Some blocks that are elongated require several player blocks to complete.
  • You can “rooftop jump” by cloning your player onto the next roof.

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move
  • Space bar to clone, up to five clones at a time.
  • If you feel stuck, go diagonal!
